name: stock_get_financial_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetches financial data for a given stock symbol from the Yahoo Finance API.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

region.description: Region code where the stock is listed. Defaults to 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.
